Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya took three crucial wickets, including Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller.
Jasprit Bumrah broke partnerships with his in-swinging deliveries.
Virat Kohli scored 76 from 59 balls, helping India post a challenging target.
Axar Patel hit four sixes and one four in his 31-ball-47, keeping India's run rate on track.
Pre-Game Insights: There was anticipation for Virat Kohliâ€™s performance after his struggles in the tournament.
Rohit Sharma was dismissed early, and India relied on Kohli to rescue the innings.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli announced his retirement from T20 internationals after the match.
Kohli expressed gratitude for achieving the goal and passing the baton to the next generation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rishabh Pant and Suryakumar Yadav were dismissed before five overs were completed.
Marco Jansen gave away 49 runs in his four overs.
Kagiso Rabada had a below-par day with the ball, finishing with figures of 36-1 from his four overs.
